title: GoldenEye 007 (Emulator with mouse and keyboard) playthrough -- Part 1
description: Playing this since I finished Perfect Dark. I've never actually beaten the game let alone on 00 Agent difficulty, so this is pretty fun. Using the mouse and keyboard controls again because I love the fact that it's even possible to play this and PD with mouse and keyboard.

fragments.text: isn't it crazy that this whole game fits on a 10MB N64 cart?
that scream sounds like one from Carmageddon
are you getting near the end of the game?
good thing they also miss a lot
the music in this game is also pretty cool
the ayy lmao is wearing an american flag vest and tie
wait are the aliens making your screen go black like that?
are you really doing goldeneye after this!?
is this in "high res" mode or standart mode?
@cubeface21 are you excited for any upcoming modern games or just old memes?
yeah emulated it probably is no big difference
I thought Cube wasnt for multiplayer memes
I was halfway down the stairs when I heard you mention Ricochet
That would be a sick game to see you play
I forgot how many barriers they added in your path for the harder difficulties on this map
Looks like I missed Attack Ship though
I walked away to get chocolate and then everything went bad
But yeah, that sounds like 'final' level in a nutshell.
What difficulty level out of curiosity?
Nice. I'm legit impressed that you got through Attack Ship, that's some rock solid shit right there.
The alt-fire of the slayer is SO MUCH FUN.
At least you know about sacrifice thing now
It was on Coob's end mate.
But he's a classy dude - and fixed it with alacrity
That gun looks like a shark
!quote add "You know what? Life's annoying. It's a lesson." ~Cubeface21 plays the final level of Perfect Dark, 2017
pogokeen --> Succesfully added Quote #99: "You know what? Life's annoying. It's a lesson." ~Cubeface21 plays the final level of Perfect Dark, 2017 [Perfect Dark] [20/04/2017]
dont remember, do you get to keep the x-ray weapon in sp?
Can you put any gun on the altar though?
Farsight only pops up for one mission in SP iirc - Deep Sea.
You can put any gun on the altar - that's correct.
It's been a while since I've played through this (which I ought to remedy)
You should play the version that comes with the Rare Replay sometime.

re: the Farsight - it auto aims. You just have to hold the aim button and it should just lock onto enemies - at least reasonably so. You should then have to adjust aim with the analog stick. At least that's how I remember it.
Isn't the Rare Replay version just the XBLA version emulated?
I did play this game as a kid for an inordinate number of hours though...
The Jet Force Gemini on it is amazing though
Because I guess they programmed it in a way it was hard to move over to the XBone.
My only gripe with JFG is that you HAVE to 100% the game to finish it. Rescue every little friggin' ewok
Which is fucking dire for speedruns.
Oh yeah that's right. Gotta rescue the bears to go to the moon or something
As an adult I rarely finish games
"gotta rescue the bears to go to the moon" That's the absolute best way I've heard it put
Oh you gotta walk through it at least once. It's an experience mate
I love dumb doors. I remember in Naxx in WoW there was a door that liek forever was just called "doodad_door5" or something. They were too lazy to fix it.
shouldnt be there a checkpoint soon? XD
JFG would be interesting to control on an emu. They added modern control schemes on the Xbone version
You heard the agent. A Skedar army!
I got suspended in high school for an animation of a dick FeelsBadMan
Protip: use a save state DukeWink
I went through a phase in High school where I would just nut tap all my friends all the time. I lost a lot of friends
@HymenAndBarfunkel but the ones you kept, you kept for life?
I won't spoil the solution - but I'll say that it's a boss fight that makes a lot of sense if you look at it and think about it. It's not a 'gotcha' sorta thing.
Except for the whole 'ARMED WITH A SLAYER BITCH' thing.
Softman25 does the callisto work for the secret?
i.e. what you have to do to beat the boss.
Nw, I was half joking. I respect that you're doing this legitimately!
Ah, I always used the Mauler alt.
Well the Mauler alt is pretty dang powerful.
"I will KILL YOUR DICK" "WHAT DOES THAT EVEN MEAN" I love Bulletstorm's dialogue
it's been so fucking rainy this month, eh?
At least save state to walk through the thing.
@Pavichokche It's been pretty ridiculous -- I think we had two days of summer weather and then it's been raining non-stop
It was nice for a week here, and then it became really cold.
Thankfully the ground isn't frozen anymore, the flooding was a bummer
yeah! It seems like better weather will start in May
Mm, I can understand that @Altazimuth -- we had a similar thing just a little while ago. Hopefully it passes soon!
That's a crack squad, not an army.
They're the Skedar remember. They almost took over Earth with like..one
Haha I'm definitely looking forward to it
Like just shoot them with a Falcon and they die.
The main Mr. Blonde doing the manipulation thing.
@Cubeface21 hasn't even started the fight and he knows what he's gotta do

LordZergeant shoots thefinalboss in the right hand!
'I have this' - said about the almost best weapon in the game
Quote #32: "Have fun, have a good day, I love all of you" -Cubeface21
Softman25 I AFK'd, which weapon was he talking about, Mauler?
That's a good quote, thanks botface
LordZergeant shoots freezing in the ass!
It's somewhat eerie - which is oddly appropriate for this section of the game
only a matter of tries and he starts running past the enemys
The printers of the door world.
Personally I can't wait until WAR!
When is a door not a door?
I also love how on lower difficulties, 'fight Skedar army' isn't an objective - although you'll still be shoved into a fight with them, you can skip it.
Maian Mishap or w/e is gonna be fun.
Quote #98: "Flappers!? This place is called Flappers?! Flappers! ...Flappers." ~Cubeface21 goes to Flappers [Duke Nukem Advance] [10/04/2017]
Wait what you can destroy those?
This is painful, so I'm going to give you a hint. It's way more obvious.
didnt even know you can destroy those
I think you found the way to cheese the area though -- oh nope, nevermind
: Try using fully-charged Mauler shots on whatever you think you might need to shoot.
guess sitting outside the door was a miss(ile)
That Skedar just wanted a hug
Then tell them to take the Freddy Kruger hands off
Q: Why not nuke the Skedar homeworld?
" ~Cubeface21 plays the final level of Perfect Dark, 2017

But it works for what it is
!quote add "I hope I'm not going too far with these quotes." - Pogokeen 2017

Don't worry @Cubeface21, you had the right idea before you even fought the boss, you're already ahead of the game!
cubeface21, you're generous for an understanding captain
Like seriously - 'it's super obvious' is the best hint that I can give, even if it isn't coming to you immediately. You'll get it though, I've got faith.
To be honest your first shot of the first battle was fine.
But you used the wrong weapon.
Explosives DON'T damage the shrine for some reason.
if only the boss was weak to sarcasm
Spoilers: First shoot the boss until he crouches down, then shoot the shrine
Quote #32: "Have fun, have a good day, I love all of you" -Cubeface21
cubeface21, you're alright for a radiant cool speedrunner
If it's any consolation, you've become a BEAST at this level
It's annoying - but because of the random placement of the towers mostly.
You want the optimal pattern, of course. So you just ramrod the optimal pattern and if it's wrong...one way ticket to reset town.
That nade launcher play was some of the greatest shit
is that why she said "leg go"?
strong female protagonist. probably a descendant of Lara Croft

he never attached trackers to the obelisks

Yeah, the towers aren't actually progression blockers
Don't we only play good games here?
alright I'm gonna go have lunch. lets hope you're in a better place when I come back
Welcome the CubeCast, this week on the show we talk to Elvis
elvis? the one who returned to his planet?
Elvis is the best character in the entire game, prove me wrong
is there a post credits level?
tfw Coob hasn't done the hardest level yet.
@Altazimuth Which one are you saying is hardest?
I want this credits sequence as a WinAmp visualization
Eh, I'd probably say that Attack Ship is harder, with WAR! above that. The former because resource management is a fucko - the latter because infini-spwans
But I don't disagree that Maian SOS is a hard motherfucker
All three bonus missions are brutal
With all the guards continuing to shout 'GET HER!'
And you can play whichever you want in whatever order.
Three are unlocked by completing the game at higher difficulties - one for each difficulty. (i.e. you unlock the first for Agent, the first 2 on SA, and three on PA)
The fourth you get by completing the gadget training levels.
On that note - when's shooting gallery?
Shooting gallery is probably really great with m/kb.
Did the coop character in Perfect Dark have a name? I can't remember if she even had one in the Deathmatch character select
Although you can unlock a bunch of other characters to (AI) co-op with, through the hardest damn cheats in the game.
wait, the default is velvet? not joanna?
Oh man making this a level was inspired./
These challenges I found so neat
Some of them are really hard.
And they managed to design one for every weapon
The tl;dr of shooting gallery is that if you fail a bronze ever - you need to re-evaluate your life. Silver you need to think about, and golds can be anywhere from piss-easy to ball-busting hard
try gold on the rcp3000 or whatever
hardest challenge in this i remember
...Do you actually have to complete this for the secret level? I thought it was just the training simulator that you had to complete
Yeah - the fourth bonus level is just the gadget training.
The shooting gallery is way more fun though, of course
Cool, phew, for a second I thought I was forgetting a lot more of this game
There's also the holo sims - the last one being a total bitch
Good choice, the shooting gallery is pretty interesting... iirc, you can glitch it so you can have weapons outside of the course area (but that might only be coop?)
hah let it run into the fire
They are seemingly indestructable whilst moving for some reason.
I think if they're turned around or somesuch.
gotta get it on the left side
: If you hit the first target, just strafe since the second target is at the same depth.
So I take it that you finished the game?
damn this is so easy with a mouse
Yeah, he's got to do the bonus missions.
Doing tranq gold on an N64 controller just made me mad.
Nope, not the combat simulator -- there is another set of training courses in Carrington
Nah, you're looking for the Carrington Institute - top floor, the room with two people in it.
Although the combat sim challenges ARE also incredibly fun
Start getting super tough as well. Fucking 18 (iirc) - the one with one hit kills and a shithouse teammate who you have to protect
remember the one challenge that would crash everytime you tried to do it 2 or 3 player or something
i had every star on every challenge except that one
did he unlock all the cheats?

game looks so weird with a mouse

It does pretty well -- I wonder if Jabo would be better for this game? I remember a lot of plugins having issues with the filters especially

now you can be a pirate

One player plays as Joanna, the other plays as all the enemies in a level
Not always the easiest, but usually very worthwhile
Well one at a time...you can suicide the dude if you don't like who you get
You might also need to complete holo training to unlock The Duel
are you gonna play the multiplayer mode ?
@ray_caster I think you can do it with Mupen64++, but it's been a while since I looked at emulation options
